duties_responsibilities.duty: Manipulate, process, and extract value from large, disconnected datasets.
Build and optimize 'big data' data pipelines, architectures, and data sets using tools like Airflow.
Expertise in data modeling, data access, and data storage techniques.
Build transformational logic using SQL on relational SQL and NoSQL databases.
Ingest, transform, and load the data using Python.
Utilize AWS cloud services: EC2, EMR, RDS, Redshift.
